div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 77 Corinth, 1930 (267) Burial: c. 327-325 B.C. Contents: 51 N. From excavations; found with gold necklace Philip II: 41 lifetime and early post. st. (Pella, Amphipolis) Alexander III: 10 lifetime st. (Amphipolis 4, Tarsus 3, Salamis 1, Sidon 1, unc. 1) Disposition: Athens Edwards-Thompson, AJA 1970, pp. 343-50, illus. (with references to earlier publications)
